meta.name: description
meta.content: Solend is a DeFi protocol for lending and borrowing on the Solana blockchain. Think Aave or Compound on Solana. Solend allows anyone with an internet connection to earn interest by lending their crypto assets, and allows them to use their deposits as collateral for borrowing.

head.title: Solend | Lend and borrow crypto on Solana

meta.content: Solend | Lend and borrow on Solana

Solend is a DeFi protocol for lending and borrowing on the Solana blockchain. Think Aave or Compound on Solana. Solend allows anyone with an internet connection to earn interest by lending their crypto assets, and allows them to use their deposits as collateral for borrowing.
